document_data.name: ''Scimitar of Shame''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''scimitar of shame''''' was a [[magic weapon]] that originated in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: These weapons were available in a wide variety of [[scimitar]]s.
document_data.Powers: A ''scimitar of shame'' was magically enhanced to make striking and injuring opponents easier compared to using a normal weapon. Upon command the wielder could activate the weapon's true powerâ€”unleashing a magical assault on the target's honor. If they target was unable to resist this onslaught then they behaved as if under the influence of a ''[[taunt]]'' spell, immediately rushing to attack the wielder of the scimitar with no regard for their surroundings. These magical taunts also interrupted spellcasting or other similar activities.
